FOR THE SUCCESSFUL For Weezer lead guitarist Brian Bell , performing "Say It Ain't So" in front of a live studio audience on "Late Show With David Letterman " was a surreal experience. Playing on TV for the first time when you're in your 20s, it's just bizarre, recalled Brian Bell . "There's a lot of pressure when you're young." Now, he said, performing in front of 100 people- or 15,000- feels "so natural." Weezer
